snippet: LEAD: James Bond is a master at narrow escapes from life-threatening traps laid by his villainous enemies. It is perhaps less noticed that, no matter how fast he roars through mountain passes on winding two-lane highways, he also escapes traffic c...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: James Bond is a master at narrow escapes from life-threatening traps laid by his villainous enemies. It is perhaps less noticed that, no matter how fast he roars through mountain passes on winding two-lane highways, he also escapes traffic cops. Sean Connery, the movies' original 007, isn't so lucky.
